Image.location: left side in the flex container

Form.location: right side in the flex container
Form.description: contains PageTitle, Input, Checkbox and Button

PageTitle.location: at the top in the Form
PageTitle.description: main heading of the Form component

Input.description: Input for taking user name, password and for confirming password

Checkbox.description: Input with type checkbox with its respective Label

outlineButton.description: it has border , icon and text

Link.location: at the bottom in the Form component
